trans-unit.source: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several user interface (UI) properties on an associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en kontroll som redigeringsprogrammet som gir sluttbrukerne mulighet til å redigere flere egenskaper for brukergrensesnitt (UI) på en tilknyttet <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart class is an editor control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and is used to edit properties that affect the appearance of an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control.
trans-unit.target: Klassen AppearanceEditorPart er en kontroll som redigeringsprogrammet som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>klasse, og brukes til å redigere egenskapene som påvirker utseendet til en tilknyttet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>eller andre serverkontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart control enables end users to edit several UI properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: AppearanceEditorPart-kontrollen kan sluttbrukerne mulighet til å redigere flere UI-egenskaper for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The type of control that appears in the page to edit each property value is listed in the adjacent cell of the following table.
trans-unit.target: Kontrolltypen som vises på denne siden til å redigere hver egenskapsverdien er oppført i tilstøtende cellen i tabellen nedenfor.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Control used to edit property| |--------------|-----------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control is used to set the text for the title.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is used to select what type of title-and-border option is used.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is used to select the direction that content flows on the page.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control is used to set a number for the height, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is used to select the units.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control is used to set a number for the height, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is used to select the units.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is used to indicate whether the control is hidden.| The AppearanceEditorPart control becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has been selected for editing.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Kontroll som brukes til å redigere egenskapen | |--------------|-----------------------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>| En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>kontroll brukes til å angi tekst for tittelen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A>| En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>kontroll brukes til å velge hvilken type tittel og kantlinje brukes. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A>| En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>kontroll brukes til å velge retningen som flyter innhold på siden. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>| En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>kontroll brukes til å angi et tall for høyden og en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>kontroll brukes til å velge enhetene. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A>| En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>kontroll brukes til å angi et tall for høyden og en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>kontroll brukes til å velge enhetene. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>| En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>kontroll brukes til å angi om kontrollen skal skjules. | Kontrollen AppearanceEditorPart vises bare når en webdeler-siden er i redigeringsmodus, og når en bestemt <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen er valgt for redigering.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart control, like all other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, resides in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone.
trans-unit.target: Som alle andre kontrollen AppearanceEditorPart <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontrollerer, finnes i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>sone kan bare inneholde <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontroller, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>Kontroller kan ikke plasseres i en annen type sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart class has a minimal set of properties.
trans-unit.target: Klassen AppearanceEditorPart har et minimalt sett med egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.Title%2A> property is used to get or set a string that is displayed as a title when the control is visible.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.Title%2A>egenskapen brukes til å hente eller angi en streng som vises som en tittel når kontrollen er synlig.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.DefaultButton%2A> property sets the inherited property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control, so that the default control that receives the focus within the AppearanceEditorPart control is the same as the default in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.DefaultButton%2A>egenskapen egenskapen arvet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>kontrollere, slik at standard kontrollen får fokus i AppearanceEditorPart kontrollen er den samme som standard i grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.DefaultButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart class also has two important methods.
trans-unit.target: Klassen AppearanceEditorPart er også viktig metodene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method overrides the base method from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>Metoden overstyrer metoden base fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is critical because it enables getting the property values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control it is editing and assigning them to the fields in the editor control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er kritiske fordi den gjør det mulig for henting av egenskapsverdiene fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll for redigering, og tilordne dem til felt i redigeringsprogrammet for kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method is also important, because it takes the values set by the user in the editing controls, and updates those property values on the control being edited.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>er også viktig, fordi det tar verdier angitt av brukeren i redigering kontroller, og oppdateringer egenskapsverdier kontrollen som redigeres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: In most cases the AppearanceEditorPart control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `<asp:appearanceditorpart>` element inside a `<zonetemplate>` element, which is in turn contained by an `<asp:editorzone>` element on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller AppearanceEditorPart kontrollen skal brukes på siden utholdenhet format av deklarerer en `<asp:appearanceditorpart>` element i en `<zonetemplate>` elementet som i sin tur inneholder en `<asp:editorzone>` element på en webside.

trans-unit.source: To edit other properties and behavior of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, you can use the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls supplied with the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: Redigere andre egenskaper og virkemåten for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroller, kan du bruke den andre <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>Kontroller angitt med webdeler kontrollen settet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: These controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>.
trans-unit.target: Dette omfatter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls should provide most editing features required to edit <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>Kontroller må gi de fleste redigering funksjonene som er nødvendig for å redigere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroller, men du kan også opprette en egendefinert redigeringsprogrammet-kontroll ved arving fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: For kodeeksempel en, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>klassen oversikt Oversiktsemnet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To improve accessibility, the AppearanceEditorPart control is rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For å forbedre tilgjengelighet, gjengis AppearanceEditorPart kontrollen i en `<fieldset>` elementet.

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the AppearanceEditorPart control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: Den `<fieldset>` elementet grupperer relaterte settet med kontroller som brukes til å redigere i AppearanceEditorPart kontrollen, og den muliggjør følgende navigering blant kontrollene for både visual (for eksempel vanlig nettlesere) og tale orientert brukeragenter (for eksempel programvare).

trans-unit.source: Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Tilgjengelighet markup gjengis som standard for denne kontrollen, kan ikke med kravene for tilgjengelighet standarder som Web innhold tilgjengelighet retningslinjene 1.0 (WCAG) prioritet 1 retningslinjene.

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om tilgjengelighet støtte for denne kontrollen, kan du se [ASP.NET-kontroller og tilgjengelighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Saves the values from an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer verdier fra en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"> </xref> kontrollen til de tilsvarende egenskapene i den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ApplyChanges er en kritisk metode på en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Kalles når brukeren klikker en knapp for OK eller et Bruk verb i redigering brukergrensesnittet (UI).

trans-unit.source: The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Den metoden formålet er å lagre verdiene som en bruker er angitt for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>kontrollen til de tilsvarende egenskapene i den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The associated control is referenced in the inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Refererer til den tilknyttede kontrollen i arvet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method attempts to set the following properties on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>
trans-unit.target: Metoden ApplyChanges prøver å angi følgende egenskaper for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action of saving values from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis handlingen lagring verdier fra det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"> </xref> styre til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen er vellykket; ellers (Hvis det oppstår en feil), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An error occurs when setting the value for any of the following properties on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is being edited: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden*>
trans-unit.target: Det oppstår en feil under angivelse av verdien for noen av de følgende egenskapene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen som er åpnet for redigering: <> </> *> <> </> *> <> </> *> <> </> *> <> </> *><>*>

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base property inherited from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.
trans-unit.target: Overstyrer egenskapen base arvet fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> kontrollen for å skjule egenskapen fra utviklere og hindre at den blir påvirket av oppsett.

trans-unit.source: Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code.
trans-unit.target: Selv om det er offentlig, denne egenskapen brukes til standard gjengivelse av denne kontrollen, og skal ikke kalles fra developer kode.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>og [ASP.NET tema og skallene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control that receives the default focus in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder IDen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"> </xref> kontrolltypen får standard fokus i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control and assigns them to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter egenskapsverdier fra en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollere og tilordner dem til det tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is a critical method on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SyncChanges er en kritisk metode på en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and updates the controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: Den implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden fra basisklassen, henter gjeldende verdier fra det tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollere og oppdateringer kontrollene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>kontroll med verdiene slik at en bruker kan redigeres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SyncChanges kalles når verdiene i den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen kan ha endret.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the SyncChanges method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: For en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>kontroll, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>sone som inneholder kontrollen kaller SyncChanges-metoden, slik at verdiene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>kontrollen er alltid synkronisert med verdiene i den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Another case where the SyncChanges method is called is when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is entering edit mode.
trans-unit.target: En annen tilfeller der metoden SyncChanges kalles er når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen går inn i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en tittel for redigeringsprogrammet for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Title property value is displayed in the title bar of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control when the control is visible in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien tittel vises i tittellinjen i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>kontrollerer når kontrollen er synlig i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Når kontrollen er deklarert i en side, kan du angi en verdi for den `Title` attributtet.

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the kinds of properties that this control allows users to edit.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angir en verdi for tittelen, brukes en standardverdi for kulturen-spesifikke som beskriver hvilke egenskaper som kontrollen tillater at brukere redigerer.

trans-unit.source: A string that is used as the title of the control.
trans-unit.target: En streng som brukes som tittelen på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en beregnet kontroll ble levert av webdeler kontrollen settet.
